meanings.definition: Papistries: the practices, beliefs, or customs associated with Roman Catholicism
meanings.sent1: The study group discussed the papistries of Roman Catholicism.
meanings.sent2: The church is filled with beautiful papistries that hold deep meaning.
meanings.sent3: She found humor in the intricate papistries of the Catholic rituals.
meanings.sent4: The papistries of their traditions woven into every aspect of their lives.
meanings.sent5: The colorful papistries of Catholicism painted a vivid picture of their faith.

meanings.definition: Papistries: objects or symbols related to the Roman Catholic Church
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient papistries from the Roman Catholic Church.
meanings.sent2: The papistries on the altar added a sense of reverence to the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: He collected small papistries as souvenirs from his visits to cathedrals.
meanings.sent4: The papistries of the church were like silent storytellers of the faith.
meanings.sent5: The intricate papistries of the church held a special significance for the parishioners.
